Police FC vs Kiyovu Sports

Police FC 4-2 Kiyovu Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:06

Kiyovu Sports isubiye ku mukino wa nyuma nyuma w'imyaka 21

Kiyovu Sports yaherukaga kugera ku mukino wa nyuma w'Igikombe cy'Amahoro mu 1998, yongeye kuwugeraho isezereye Police FC ku bitego byo hanze dore ko ikipe y'abashinzwe umutekano itsinze ibitego 4-2 muri uyu mukino wo kwishyura, amakipe yombi akanganya ibitego 4-4 mu mikino yombi.

Umukino wa nyuma uzahuza Kiyovu Sports na AS Kigali ku wa Kane tariki ya 4 Nyakanga mu gihe umwanya wa gatatu uzahuza Rayon Sports na Police FC.

Tubashimire mwese twabanye uyu munsi, tuzasubire hasozwa irushanwa ry'Igikombe cy'Amahoro cy'uyu mwaka.

17:03

Umukino urarangiye

16:48

84' Igitego cya kane cya Police FC

Ndayisaba Hamidou atsinze igitego cya kane cya Police FC ku mupira uhinduwe na Iyabivuze Osee mu rubuga rw'amahina.

16:43

82' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Kapiteni wa Police FC, Ngendahimana Eric ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Bonane Janvier.

16:38

77' Nzeyurwanda akomeje kuba ibamba

Police FC iri gusatira bikomeye muri iyi minota. Muvandimwe ahinduye umupira ukomeye mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Nzeyurwanda Djihad mu gihe uyu munyezamu anafashe umupira w'umutwe utewe na Ngendahimana Eric nyuma y'uko Ndayisaba Hamidou yari ateye koruneri.

16:33

72' Gusatirana gukomeye

Police FC iteye coup-franc binyuze kuri Muvandimwe Jean Marie, Kiyovu ikiza izamu ndetse ikora contre-attaque, aho Shavy Babicka ahinduye umupira ukomeye mu izamu, ukurwaho na Hakizimana Issa n'umutwe.

16:31

70'

16:28

67' Gusimbuza

Usabimana Olivier watsindiye Police FC ibitego bibiri, avuye mu kibuga asimburwa na Iyabivuze Osee. Police FC ikomeje gusatira ariko umupir utewe na Uwimbabazi Jean Paul ushyirwa muri koruneri na Rwabuhihi Placide.

16:25

64' Igitego cya kabiri cya Kiyovu Sports

Shavy Babicka asize Muvandimwe Jean Marie, ahindura umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, usanga Armel Ghislain atsindira Kiyovu Sports igitego cyiyongereye amahirwe menshi yo kugera ku mukino wa nyuma. Agg 3-4.

16:19

58' Coup-franc ya Kiyovu Sports

Muvandimwe JMV akiniye nabi Shavy Babicka, ikosa rihanwe na Kalisa Rachid, umupira ukurwaho na Hakizimana Issa. Kalisa Rashid yongeye gutera undi mupira w'umuterekano uca ku ruhande rw'izamu.

16:16

56' Police FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Uwimbabazi Jean Paul atanze umupira kuri Ndayisaba Hamidou uteye ishoti rikomeye ari inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina, umunyezamu Nzeyurwanda Djihad arirambura arenza umupira ujya muri koruneri.

16:11

61' Kiyovu Sprts ihushije igitego

Ghislain Armel na Kalisa Rashid bananiwe gutsindira Kiyovu Sports ku mupira wisirisimbye imbere y'izamu mu gihe awuhaye Habamahoro Vincent uteye ishoti umupira ujya hejuru y'izamu.

16:07

47' Coup-franc ya Kiyovu Sports

Mpozembizi Mohamed akoreye ikosa kuri Ghislain Armel ahagana muri koruneri. Ikosa rihanwe na Kalisa Rachid umupira ukurwaho na Uwimbabazi Jean Paul n'umutwe, urarenga.

16:05

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Police FC itangije igice cya kabiri. Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique asubiza umupira inyuma kuri bagenzi be.

15:49

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

15:49

45+1' Gusatira kwa Kiyovu Sports

Armel Ghislain ateye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, Nshimiyimana Ibrahim ashyiraho umutwe, uca imbere gato y'izamu.

15:48

45' Iminota ibiri y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, Ngabonziza, yerekanye iminota ibiri y'inyongera. Kiyovu Sports ikomeje gusatira, aho ibonye koruneri ebyiri zikurikiranya ariko ntacyo zitanze.

15:46

44' Police FC irarokotse

Nsabimana Aimable atakaje umupira kuri Armel Ghislain, awuhinduye mu izamu Hakizimana Issa aritambika, arawuhagarika. Shavy Babicka yari mu barekerereje imbere y'izamu.

15:44

41' Gusimbuza

Kiyovu Sports ikoze impinduka hakiri kare, Nsanzimfura Keddy watanze umupira wavuyemo igitego cyayo, asimbuwe na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim.

15:41

36' Igitego cya gatatu cya Police FC

Usabimana Olivier atsinze igitego cyiza cy'irushanwa nyuma yo gutera ishoti ari muri metero nka 25, umupira uruhukira mu izamu kuko umunyezamu wa Kiyovu Sports atabashije kuwugeraho. Ubu ni ibitego 3-3 mu mikino yombi n'ubwo Kiyovu Sports yakomeza birangiye gutya.

15:36

33' Police FC iri kugerageza amashoti ya kure

Uwimbabazi Jean Paul agerageje ishoti rya kure, rica ku ruhande rw'izamu mu gihe na Mpozembizi Mohamed ateye undi mupira ujya hanze.

15:33

31' Igitego cya kabiri cya Police FC

Police FC itsinze igitego cya kabiri ku mupira ukomeye utewe na Usabimana Olivier uri gukina mu ruhande rw'iburyo. Kugeza ubu ni 2-3 mu mikino yombi.

15:28

25' Police FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique asubije umupira inyuma ahereza Uwimbabazi Jean Paul uteye ishoti rikomeye umupira ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu mbere y'uko Serumogo Ally akiza izamu.

15:26

23' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Muvandimwe Jean Marie Vianney ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukandagira Bonane Janvier wa Kiyovu Sports. Ikosa rihanwe na Nsanzimfura Keddy umukinnyi ukurwaho na Nsabimana Aimable n'umutwe.

15:21

19' Gusimbuza

Songa Isaie wavunitse amaze gutsindira Police FC, asimbuwe na Hakizimana Kevin.

15:19

15' Igitego cya Police FC

Police FC yishyuye igitego kuri contre-attaque ikoze mu ruhande rw'iburyo. Songa Isaie asize abario Ngarambe Ibrahim, aroba umunyezamu Nzeyurwanda Djihad wari wasohotse, umupira wari ukurikiwe na Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique ukomeza mu izamu ryambaye ubusa.

15:17

14' Kiyovu ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Nsanzimfura Keddy azamukanye umupira awutanga kuri Ghislain Armel Djimoe ariruka asiga myugariro wa Police FC, ahindura umupira mu izamu ukozweho na Shavy Babicka uramutenguha ujya hejuru y'izamu.

15:14

12' Gusatira kwa Kiyovu Sports

Kalisa Rachid atanze umupira kuri Serumogo Ally wari mu ruhande rw'iburyo, awuhindura u rubuga rw'amahina, ukozweho na Armel Ghislain ujya hanze.

15:12

9' Police FC ihushije uburyo bwiza

Mpozembizi Mohamed azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'iburyo, awuhindura mu rubuga rw'amahina, Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique akinira nabi mygariro wa Kiyovu Sports.

15:05

3' Igitego cya Kiyovu Sports

Police FC itangiye ikora amakosa menshi. Nsanzimfura Keddy ateye umupira wa kabiri w'umuterekano ubonetse mu mukino, ushyirwaho umutwe na Habamahoro Vincent ujya mu izamu.

15:03

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Nsoro Ruzindana atangije umukino. Kiyovu Sports itangiye isatira ariko uwo ku ruhande avuga ko habayeho kurarira.

14:57

Ibigwi by'amakipe yombi mu gikombe cy'Amahoro

Kiyovu Sports ifite ibikombe bitatu byâ€™igihugu. Icya nyuma igiheruka mu 1993 ubwo yanatwaraga shampiyona. Ibi bivuze ko itaratwara iri rushanwa kuva ryitiriwe Amahoro mu 1995.

Police FC yegukanye iri rushanwa mu 2015 ndetse ni cyo gikombe ifite kuva ishinzwe.

14:41

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku mpande zombi

Police FC: Bwanakweri Emmanuel, Ngendahimana Eric, Mpozembizi Mohamed, Muvandimwe JMV, Hakizimana Issa, Nsabimana Aimable, Usabimana Olivier, Ndayisaba Hamidou, Songa Isaie, Uwimbabazi Jean Paul na Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique.

Umutoza: Nshimiyimana Maurice â€˜Masoâ€™

Kiyovu Sports: Nzeyurwanda Djihad, Serumogo Ally, Ngarambe Ibrahim, Ngirimana, Rwabuhihi Aime Placide, Kalisa Rachid, Bonane Janvier, Nsanzimfura Keddy, Shavy Babicka na Armel Ghislain.

Umutoza: Kirasa Alain

14:39

Ninde usanga AS Kigali ku mukino wa nyuma?

AS Kigali yaraye igeze ku mukino wa nyuma isezereye Rayon Sports kuri penaliti 4-2 nyuma yo kunganya ibitego 3-3 mu mikino yombi.

Umukino wa nyuma uzaba ku wa Kane tariki ya 4 Nyakanga.

Ikipe izegukana iri rushanwa ni yo izahagararira u Rwanda muri CAF Confederation Cup 2019/20.

14:37

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambi hagiye kubera umukino wo kwishyura wa 1/2 mu gikombe cy'Amahoro hagati ya Police FC na Kiyovu Sports.

Kiyovu Sports yatsinze ibitego 2-0 mu mukino ubanza wabaye ku wa Kane.

Umukino nyir'izina uratangira saa 15:00
